---
title: "Styling"
---

## HTML themes

Find the other options [on the Quarto themes page](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/html-themes.html).

```yaml
---
format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo   # cosmo bootswatch theme
---
```

## Link colors

```yaml
---
format:
  html:
    linkcolor: red
---
```

## Custom CSS

```yaml
---
format:
  html:
    css: styles.css
---
```

## Sidebar/column sizing

There are a lot of options for [reformatting the page](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/page-layout.html), especially noteable is the [grid customization](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/page-layout.html#grid-customization).
